# backIndicatorImage

**Instance Property**

The image shown beside the Back button.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var backIndicatorImage: UIImage? { get set }
```

## Discussion

If you want to customize the back-indicator image, you must also set [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UINavigationBar/backIndicatorTransitionMaskImage].

## Configuring the Back button

- **backIndicatorTransitionMaskImage**: The image used as a mask for content during push and pop transitions.
